title: A decade since formation, LCSG still hurdled by manpower, decentralization concerns
excerpt: Concerns over working under Manila-centric systems and with limited manpower continues to exist even a decade after the inception of the Laguna Campus Student Government.

title: On the microscale: Women lead USG amid widespread misogyny
excerpt: For the past few years, women leaders have been at the helm of the USG, overcoming gendered notions of effective leadership within the University and in larger society.

title: Is there room for more? Independent candidates challenge DLSU two-party system
excerpt: Independent candidates have opened discussions on whether it is high time for a third option to challenge both Tapat and Santugon, but it is not all that simple.
